<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk delete models"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/bulk/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple models in a single operation.

**Use Cases**
- Mass model cleanup
- Category-wide model removal
- Batch model deletion workflows

**Request Options**
- `ModelIds` - Array of specific model IDs to delete
- `IsSelectAll` - When true, deletes all models matching ModelsRequest filters
- `ModelsRequest` - Filter criteria when using IsSelectAll

**Warning**: This operation is irreversible. Ensure no assets reference these models.

**Related Endpoints**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}](/docs/api/models/delete-model) - Single model deletion

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
